name: Bitcoin D. Roger
description:
Growing old is a curse in itself for me. Yeah, it's really fun to have a partner & a cute baby. But as the days goes by, I'm getting further and further away from all my hobbies. Even though it's my hobbies that have helped a lot so far, I don't even know now where are all my comics and manga. In fact, I am an One Piece topnotch manga reader.

With this artwork I wanna celebrate that loses and get back to my old hobby again. I remember the point to make myself happy instead of all.
